author: Felicitynayong
content: My installation got cancelled on the day of installation itself. Their staff failed to inform me and if i didnt call 2 hours before the supposed installation time, i would have waited in vain. Their customer service personnel, Ahmad bin Arif (not sure if its even his rreal name) assured me that they will come next week. I will call them everyday til then to make sure that they do. Will updats here next week.
